diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,52 @@
+/* Copyright 2017 The TensorFlow Authors. All Rights Reserved.
body:
The annotation processor won't be part of the final jar, it will only be invoked while building it as a Bazel `java_plugin`, collecting generated and core/custom ops, and won't be accessible thereafter. The Ops file that it generates, though, will be included in the library.

So the need of keeping CC and Java generators separated is still present but we could drop off the /ops subfolder as you suggested?
body_html:

So the need of keeping CC and Java generators separated is still present but we could drop off the /ops subfolder as you suggested?
body_text:
The annotation processor won't be part of the final jar, it will only be invoked while building it as a Bazel java_plugin, collecting generated and core/custom ops, and won't be accessible thereafter. The Ops file that it generates, though, will be included in the library.
So the need of keeping CC and Java generators separated is still present but we could drop off the /ops subfolder as you suggested?
